text:
Subject: Company Town Hall Recording

For those who were unable to attend yesterday's town hall, a recording is now available at the following link. No action is required.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: FYI: The latest company-wide survey results are in

Thanks to everyone who participated in our annual employee satisfaction survey. The high-level results have been compiled and can be viewed in the attached presentation.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Just a heads-up: We're having a chili cook-off next month!

Get your recipes ready! We're having a chili cook-off next month. There will be prizes for the top three entries.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Time-Sensitive: Client Proposal Approval Needed

Hi Marketing team, the proposal for the Acme Corp account needs final approval in the next hour to meet the client's deadline. Please review the attached document and provide your sign-off immediately.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Your input is needed on the new design system

Hi Design Team, we're proposing a few updates to our design system. Please review the proposal and add your comments and suggestions by EOD Thursday.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Information: The company has a new employee assistance program

We are pleased to announce a new employee assistance program. It provides confidential counseling and support to employees.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Critical: We have a major software update that is causing problems

We have released a major software update that is causing problems for some of our customers. We are working to fix the problems and will provide an update as soon as possible.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: FYI: The latest company blog post is live

Our latest company blog post is now live on the website. Feel free to share it with your networks.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Office WiFi Password Update

FYI, the office WiFi password will be updated tonight at 9 PM. The new password will be posted in the usual locations tomorrow morning.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Please design a new banner for the website

Could you please design a new banner for the website to promote our upcoming sale?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Please create a new product video

We need a new product video to showcase our latest feature. Could you please create a script and a storyboard?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Urgent: Your immediate attention is required for a security update

We have released a critical security update for our software. Please install it immediately to protect your computer from attack.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Critical: We have a major production issue

We have a major production issue that is affecting all of our customers. We need to fix this immediately.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Critical: We have a major security vulnerability

We have discovered a major security vulnerability in our software. We need to fix this immediately to protect our customers' data.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Can you help me with this?

Hi [Name], I'm a bit stuck on the data analysis for the Q3 report. Would you have some time to help me out with it tomorrow afternoon?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: ACTION REQUIRED: Your immediate action is needed to resolve a critical bug

A critical bug has been identified in the latest release. All available developers, please focus on resolving this issue immediately.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Welcome to the Team, David!

Please join me in giving a warm welcome to David Chen, who is starting today as our new Senior Data Analyst. He'll be sitting by the window, so please stop by and say hello!
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Time-sensitive: Please approve the attached press release

We need final approval on the attached press release by 2 PM today in order to meet the distribution deadline.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Critical: The CEO has resigned

We are writing to inform you that the CEO has resigned, effective immediately. We will be holding a company-wide meeting to discuss this news.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Immediate Attention: Production Server CPU at 99%

The production database server (PROD-DB-02) is experiencing critical CPU load and is at risk of failing. On-call engineers, please investigate immediately.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Urgent: Your immediate attention is required for a system alert

We have received a system alert that requires your immediate attention. Please review the alert and take appropriate action.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: FYI: The company has a new mission statement

We have updated our company mission statement to better reflect our values and goals. You can read it on our website.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Please create a training manual

Could you please create a training manual for the new software? It should cover all of the key features and how to use them.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Immediate action needed: We have a malware infection

We have detected a malware infection on our network. We are working to remove the malware and will provide more information as soon as possible.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: URGENT: Overdue invoice - Final notice before service suspension

This is the final notice regarding invoice #INV-8337, which is now 60 days past due. Payment must be made within 48 hours to avoid suspension of your account.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Critical: Data leak discovered

We have discovered a data leak that may have exposed sensitive customer information. We are taking this matter very seriously and will provide more information as it becomes available.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: For your awareness: The office will be closed for cleaning on Saturday

The office will be closed for deep cleaning on Saturday. Please make sure to take all of your personal belongings with you on Friday.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: FYI: Office Closure for Public Holiday

Please be reminded that the office will be closed this coming Monday in observance of the public holiday. Normal operations will resume on Tuesday.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: FYI: New health and wellness resources available

Hi Team, we've partnered with a new wellness platform to provide additional resources for mental and physical health. Check out the attached flyer for more details.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: For your awareness: The office will be closed for a holiday

The office will be closed on Monday in observance of the holiday. We will reopen on Tuesday.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: FYI: We have a new intern starting next week

We have a new intern, [Name], starting next week. Please make them feel welcome.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Please create a presentation for the client meeting

Hi [Name], could you please create a presentation for the client meeting next week? I've attached the key points to cover.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Please book your travel for the conference

For those attending the conference next month, please book your travel and accommodation by the end of next week. The company travel policy is attached for your reference.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Please create a new company vision

We are looking for a new company vision. Could you please come up with some ideas?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Just a heads-up: We're having a game night next week!

Come and join us for a game night next week. We'll be playing board games, card games, and video games.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Please schedule a debrief for the Alpha project

Hi Sam, now that the Alpha project has launched, could you please schedule a 1-hour debrief meeting for the project team sometime next week?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: FYI: The latest company financials are available

The latest company financials have been published and are available for review on the intranet.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: FYI: The company has been acquired

We are excited to announce that our company has been acquired. We will be sharing more details in the upcoming town hall meeting.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Immediate action needed: System breach identified

A system breach has been identified. We are taking immediate action to contain it. Please log off from all systems until further notice.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Urgent: Please confirm your attendance for the emergency meeting

We are holding an emergency meeting at 10 AM to discuss the latest client feedback. Please confirm your attendance immediately.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Urgent: There has been a chemical spill

There has been a chemical spill in the building. Please evacuate immediately.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Action Item: Update Your Contact Information

To ensure our records are up to date, please take a moment to review and update your contact information in the employee portal by Friday.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Your updated benefits statement is available

This email is to notify you that your updated benefits statement for the new fiscal year is now available for download in your employee portal.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Critical: We have a major software vulnerability

We have discovered a major software vulnerability that could allow attackers to take control of our systems. We need to fix this immediately.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Follow-up on our conversation

Hi [Name], great chatting with you earlier. As discussed, could you please send me the links to the resources you mentioned? Thanks!
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Immediate action needed: We have a brute-force attack

We are currently under a brute-force attack. We are working to block the attack and will provide more information as it becomes available.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Information: The company has a new travel policy

We have a new travel policy. Please review it before you book your next business trip.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: FYI: The company has a new tuition reimbursement program

We are excited to announce a new tuition reimbursement program. We want to help our employees further their education.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Please schedule a call with the client

Could you please schedule a call with the client for sometime next week to discuss the project timeline?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Please create a new company offboarding process

We need a new company offboarding process to ensure a smooth transition for departing employees. Could you please create a plan?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Please write a thank you note to the client

Could you please write a thank you note to the client for their business? I've attached some key points to include.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Please organize the company's website

Our company's website is disorganized. Could you please organize it and create a sitemap?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Immediate action needed: Your account has been suspended

Your account has been suspended due to a violation of our terms of service. Please contact us immediately to appeal this decision.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: FYI: Summary of Today's All-Hands Meeting

Hi Team, for those who couldn't make it, I've attached a brief summary of the key takeaways from this morning's all-hands meeting. No action required.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Critical: We are being sued

We have just been served with a lawsuit. We will be holding an emergency meeting to discuss this matter.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: FYI: The company has a new pet-friendly policy

We are excited to announce a new pet-friendly policy. You can now bring your furry friends to work with you.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Please write a press release

Could you please write a press release announcing our new partnership? I've attached the details.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: ACTION REQUIRED: Server Offline

All, the main web server (PROD-WEB-01) is unresponsive. All engineers on call, please join the incident bridge immediately.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Please create a new marketing campaign

We need a new marketing campaign to promote our new product. Could you please come up with some ideas?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Please update the company website

Could you please update the company website with the latest news and events? I've attached the content.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Please write a new company values statement

We are looking for a new company values statement. Could you please come up with some ideas?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Please organize the company holiday party

Hi [Name], I'd like you to organize the company holiday party this year. Please come up with a theme and a budget.
label: To-Do
